name: notion-mcp-server
description: Official MCP server for Notion API integration
long_description: This extension provides seamless integration with Notion's API through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It enables AI assistants to read, write, and manage Notion pages, databases, and blocks directly. Perfect for automating Notion workflows and enhancing productivity.

tools.name: notion-search
tools.description: Search for pages and databases in Notion workspace

tools.name: notion-pages-retrieve
tools.description: Retrieve a specific page by its ID

tools.name: notion-pages-create
tools.description: Create a new page in Notion

tools.name: notion-pages-update
tools.description: Update properties of an existing page

tools.name: notion-blocks-children-list
tools.description: List child blocks of a page or block

tools.name: notion-blocks-children-append
tools.description: Append new blocks to a page or block

tools.name: notion-blocks-retrieve
tools.description: Retrieve a specific block by its ID

tools.name: notion-databases-query
tools.description: Query a database and retrieve pages that match filters

tools.name: notion-users-list
tools.description: List all users in the workspace

tools.name: notion-users-retrieve
tools.description: Retrieve information about a specific user

tools.name: notion-users-me
tools.description: Retrieve information about the current user

tools.name: notion-comments-list
tools.description: List comments on a page or block

tools.name: notion-comments-create
tools.description: Create a new comment on a page or block

notion_api_key.title: Notion API Key
notion_api_key.description: Your Notion integration API key. Create one at https://www.notion.so/my-integrations

base_url.description: Base URL for Notion API (usually https://api.notion.com)
